text: Deep (and IMO legitimate) concern from Dems here that Trump gets a look at the Mueller report and offer his own hot take before Congress is able to see it. Per the @nytimes there is nothing stopping Barr from sharing it with Trump today/tonight -- except, of course, for norms.
author: alexwagner

text:
Q:"What if Mr. Trump reads the report and tweets inaccuracies about it?"
A: "Even if Mr. Mueller and Mr. Barr know that what Mr. Trump is saying publicly is not true, there is no apparent legal duty for the Justice Department to correct the president."
author: alexwagner

text: Need to know whether the baseball cap logo says anything about conspiracy to defraud the United States
author: alexwagner

text: Wait are screenshots part of the official Presidential Records Act nevermind
author: alexwagner

text: You should definitely watch this week's mid-season finale of @Sho_theCircus -- featuring Steve Bannon, @BetoORourke @RepJeffries @CoryBooker @KamalaHarris @MittRomney @LindseyGrahamSC and MORE. And then rest assured that we will be BACK!
author: alexwagner
